title: Erotic Aftershock
overview: In the heart of downtown Los Angeles a corrupt cop and a drug lord rule the seedy underworld from the hottest strip club in the city, Aftershock, until an investigative journalist and a disgraced cop team up to take them down once and for all. Drop dead gorgeous Club Jenna contract starlets Jesse Capelli, Brea Bennett, and Roxy Jezel light up the screen in this fast paced action thriller that will take your breath away. For every dark desire of the heart there is a price to be paid.
